mapper.select: select menu_info_idx, menu_info_name from menu_info_table order by menu_info_idx
select menu_info_idx, menu_info_name from menu_info_table where menu_info_idx like '1_' order by menu_info_idx;
select menu_info_idx, menu_info_name from menu_info_table where menu_info_idx like '2_' order by menu_info_idx;
select menu_info_idx, menu_info_name from menu_info_table where menu_info_idx like '3_' order by menu_info_idx;
select menu_info_idx, menu_info_name from menu_info_table where menu_info_idx like '6_' order by menu_info_idx;
